MY BORING CV

PROJECT'S I'VE WORKED ON


PROJECT : BLOODCARE

ROLE : FULL STACK SOFTWARE DEVELOPER

LINK : bloodbank

I was reponsible for designing a the web application with html and css and i also developed a web app app which aims to stramline the connection between bloodbanks,blood donors and patients/hospitals in Africa and this consist of order pages and also profile page for the blood donors where they can interact with the administrator by making different actions on it.Although this project was presented as my final year project.



PROJECT : DOIT

ROLE : FULL STACK SOFTWARE DEVELOPER

LINK : DOIT

This is a personal project in which i was responsible for developing and designing this API centric application with Vuejs and Nodejs.This is a web application which aims to enhance the productivity of people by handling tasks and note effectively whereby users are been reminded of their unaccomplished tasks at due date via email or text message.It is still in development mode
